Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: When a system block gets taken out, the integrity of all systems will be temporarily protected and stay at the value they had before damage\nto prevent rapid integrity decline in a battle, when the inital system was built with good integrity.\nProtection cancels when a block gets added.
Element.Original: When a system block gets taken out, the integrity of all systems will be temporarily protected and stay at the value they had before damage\nto prevent rapid integrity decline in a battle, when the inital system was built with good integrity.\nProtection cancels when a block gets added.

Element.Translation: Enables the ability to store multiple charges of your Jump Drive.\n\r
Element.Original: Enables the ability to store multiple charges of your Jump Drive.\n\r

Element.Translation: Sichere Welt vor der Migration auf ein neues Dateiformat
Element.Original: Back up world when migrating to a new file format

Element.Translation: Sie betrachten Ihre Fraktion als Feind
Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: WARNING: Shield matrix is currently disrupted!\nUnable to stop any damage.
Element.Original: WARNING: Shield matrix is currently disrupted!\nUnable to stop any damage.

Element.Translation: Ein Hightech-Material, genutzt zur Produktion von verstärkter Panzerung aus standard Panzerung.
Element.Original: High-Tech Material capable of further enhancing the structure of standard armor blocks. This creates advanced armor.

Element.Translation:
Ich habe euch alles gelehrt was ich weiß. 
Spreche mit NPC-3 für die nächsten Schritte in diesem Tutorial! 

Viel Spaß!
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-3 for the next steps in the tutorial!

Have a good tick!

Element.Translation:
Wenn Sie einen Kanonen-Computer oder irgend einen andere Steuerung auf einem Schiff platzieren werden diese automatisch mit dem
Schiffskern verbunden. Nach dem Platzieren eines Computers wird jedes Kanonenrohr-Modul automatisch verlinkt, außer Sie wählen
etwas anderes.

Probier es aus. Ich gebe Ihnen ein Computer und einige Kanonenrohr-Module. Stellen Sie den Computer zuerst und 
platzieren Sie dann die Module. Wenn Sie damit zufrieden sind, drücke ' T ' um das Waffenmenü zu öffnen.
Element.Original:
If you place a cannon computer or any other controller on a ship, it is automatically connected to the
core. After you place a computer, each cannon barrel is automatically linked, unless you select
something else.

Go ahead, give it a shot. I'll give you a computer and some barrels. Place the computer first and then
place the barrels. After you're happy with it, press 'T' to open the weapons panel.

Element.Translation: Zum Glück musst du auf Schiffen, wenn du es in der richtigen Reihenfolge machst, nicht alles manuel verbinden!\n\n
Element.Original:
Luckily on ships, if you put them down in the right order, you
won't have to do any manual connecting at all!

Element.Translation:
Der Bergbaulaser erlaubt es dir Blöcke und Mineralien aus einer sicheren Entfernung abzubauen.
Das geht natürlich viel schneller, als alles mit der Hand abzubauen. Außerdem erhöht sich die Effizienz des Bergbaulasers mit seiner Größe.

Die Laserkanone ist deine Standard Verteidigung und macht mehr Schaden, je größer die Kanone ist.
Du kannst außerdem verschiedene Versionen davon bauen, wie zum Beispiel eine Schrotflinte oder einen Schnellfeuerlaser.
Ich werde dir später erklären wie das funktioniert.
Element.Original:
The salvage beam lets you take blocks and mine minerals from a safe distance.
It's also much faster than picking up those blocks by hand, and will increase efficiency with salvage beam size.

The laser cannon is your basic defence and does more damage the bigger it is.
You can also make different versions of it, like a shotgun or a machine gun type.
I'll explain how that works later.

Element.Translation:
Sehr gut %s, du lernst schnell!
Jetzt lass uns ansehen, wie Waffen und andere Systeme auf Schiffen funktionieren.
Es stehen mehrere Waffen zur Auswahl sowie auch mehrere Systeme,
von welchen die wichtigsten der Bergbaulaser und die Laserkanone.
Element.Original:
Well done %s, you are a fast learner!
Now, let's check out how weapons and other systems work on ships.
There are several weapons to choose from, as well as several systems,
most importantly the salvage beam and the laser cannon.

Element.Translation:
Ich werde dir einen Kern, ein paar Energiemodule und einen Antrieb geben.
Um den Kern zu erzeugen, drücke einfach 'X' und gib ihm einen Namen. Stelle sicher, dass vor dir genug Platz
 ist, also sieh nicht auf den Boden während du das machst.

Lass mich nur kurz das vorgefertigte Schiff für dich entfernen.
Element.Original:
I will give you a core, a few power modules and a thruster.
To spawn that core, just press 'X' and name it. Be sure there is enough space
in front of you, so don't look at the ground while doing this.

Let me remove this pre-made ship real quick for you.

Element.Translation:
Ein Schiff braucht zwei grundlegende Systeme um benutzbar zu sein: Energie und Antrieb.
Platziere beide Typen auf deinem Schiff und du wirst in der Lage sein zu fliegen.
Bedenke, dass je mehr Antriebsmodule du baust, desto mehr Energie wirst du benötigen
und desto schneller wirst du beschleunigen!
Element.Original:
A ship needs two essential systems to be usable: Power and Thrust.
Place both types on your ship and you will be able to fly.
Keep in mind, the more thrust modules you place, the more power you will need
and the faster you'll accelerate!

Element.Translation:
Es gibt verschiedene Wege, um ein Schiff an sich zu bringen. Kauf es aus dem Blaupausen-Katalog,
stiehl eines, zerstöre eines, erhalte eines als ein Geschenk, und natürlich, bau dir selbst eines!
Du kannst so viele bauen wie du möchtest!
Ein guter Schiffsbauer kann Schiffe konstruieren, welche alle anderen Schiffe dominieren können, solange sie die gleiche Größe haben,
aber lass uns mit den Grundlagen anfangen.
Element.Original:
There are various ways to acquire a ship. Buy one from the blueprint catalogue,
steal one, defeat one, get one as a gift, and of course build one yourself!
You can build as many as you like!
A good ship builder can construct ships that dominate any other ship of equal size,
but let's start with the basics.

Element.Translation:
Ah %s, du hast es geschaft!
'm "NPC-02"!

 Nun da du weist wie man ein Schiff fliegt, Werde ich dir nun beibringen wie man eines baut.
Element.Original:
Ah %s, you made it!
I'm "NPC-02"!

Now that you know how to fly a ship, I will teach you how to build one.

Element.Translation: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Cubatoms des puren, kristallinen Parseen schweben in dieser Kapsel.
Element.Original: Cubatoms of pure crystaline Parseen float suspended within this capsule.

Element.Translation: Reaktorkammer um die Logistik-Fähigkeiten zu verbessern. \n\r muss, mithilfe von Reaktor Leitungen, physisch mit einem Reaktor verbunden sein.
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance logistics.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: Reaktorkammer um die Tarnungsfähigkeiten zu verbessern. \n\r muss, mithilfe von Reaktor Leitungen, physisch mit einem Reaktor verbunden sein.
Element.Original: Reactor Chamber to enhance stealth capabilities.\n\rNeeds to be physically connected with a Power Reactor by using Reactor Conduit blocks.

Element.Translation: Aktiviert die permanente Benutzung des \"Stealth\"monitors mit permanentem Energieverbrauch.
Element.Original: Enables permanent usage of your Stealth Drive at the cost of always consuming power.

Element.Translation: Lernen Sie die Grundlagen der Bewegung und des Bauens.
Element.Original: Learn the basics of moevement and building.

Element.Translation: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Schützen Sie Ihr Schiff durch Schilde.
Element.Original: Protect your ship by adding shields.

Element.Translation: Schneller und einfacher bauen mit fortgeschrittenen Bauwerkzeugen.
Element.Original: Faster and easier building with advanced build tools.

Element.Translation: Erfahren Sie, wie sie Antriebe für Ihr Schiff einbauen.
Element.Original: Learn how add thrust for your ship.

Element.Translation: Erfahren Sie wie sie eine Stromversorgung für eine Struktur aufbauen.
Element.Original: Learn how to build power supply for a structure.

Element.Translation: The rail speed controller is used to manipulate the speed of your rails. Place it down and connect from it to all the rails that should be controlled. Using shift+V in build mode will add all touching rail blocks in the same direction. Then connect any number of activation blocks from the rail speed controller. The number of active blocks in opposition to the number of inactive blocks determines the speed percentage. So 5 active and 5 inactive is 50% of max speed, the same as 100 active and 100 inactive
Element.Original: The rail speed controller is used to manipulate the speed of your rails. Place it down and connect from it to all the rails that should be controlled. Using shift+V in build mode will add all touching rail blocks in the same direction. Then connect any number of activation blocks from the rail speed controller. The number of active blocks in opposition to the number of inactive blocks determines the speed percentage. So 5 active and 5 inactive is 50% of max speed, the same as 100 active and 100 inactive

Element.Translation: Spieler kicken die modifizierte Blaupausen benutzen
Element.Original: Kick players that spawn modified blueprints

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Ich ein Schiff für Sie vorbereitet, hinter dieser Tür! \nSie können es mit \"R\" betreten
Element.Original: I prepared a ship for you behind that door!\nYou can enter it with 'R'

Element.Translation: Es gibt zwei Modi:\n - Den Baumodus, um effizient ein Schiff zu bauen und\n- den Flugmodus, um mit deinem Schiff zu fliegen und Waffen zu nutzen
Element.Original: There are two modes:\n- Build Mode, to efficiently build a ship\n- Flight Mode, to fly your ship and fire weapons

Element.Translation: Klasse! Du bist nun im Baumodus des Schiffes!
Element.Original: Great! You are now in build mode of the ship!

Element.Translation: Ein StarMade-Server-Instanz läuft bereits auf Port %s
Element.Original: A StarMade Server Instance is already running on port %s

Element.Translation: Erstellung der Indexe erfolgreich!\nViel Spaß beim Spielen!
Mal sehen, ob du es zu NPC-02 auf\nder anderen Seite dieses Bereichs schaffst
Element.Original: Let's see if you can make\nyour way over to NPC-02 over on the\nother side of this area

Element.Translation: Ein Fehler ist während der Erstellung der Inhalts-Datenbank aufgetreten!\n Bitte sende einen Fehlerbericht!
Element.Original: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!

Element.Translation:
Super, an den Seiten siehst
du nun die Statusanzeigen deines Schiffs.
Bedenke auch, dass je größer das Schiff wird,
es auch immer länger dauert es zu drehen.
Element.Original:
Great, on the sides you now see your ship's status
bars.
Also keep in mind that the bigger a ship is, the longer
it will take to turn.

Element.Translation: Ein Fehler ist während der Erstellung der Inhalts-Datenbank aufgetreten!\n Bitte sende einen Fehlerbericht!
Element.Original: An error occurred creating the index database!\nPlease sent an error report!

Element.Translation: Wechsle nun in den Flugmodus indem zu die\nLeertaste drückst.
Element.Original: Switch now to flight mode by pressing\nthe space bar.

Element.Translation: Du kannst sie ausserdem neu ordnen,\noder neue Waffen aus dem Waffenmenü zur Hotbar hinzufügen,\nindem du \'$WEAPON_PANEL\' benutzt
Element.Original: You can also rearrange them, or\nassign new weapons to your hotbar\nin the weapons menu by pressing '$WEAPON_PANEL'

Element.Translation:
Drücke $FORWARD $BACKWARDS $STRAFE_LEFT $STRAFE_RIGHT und $UP $DOWN um Ihre Steuerdüsen zu nutzen. 
Drücke SHIFT-links zum Bremsen. 
Mit dem Mausrad und Zifferntasten wählen Sie
Waffen odr Werkzeuge aus der Schnelleiste. 
Es gibt 10 Schnellleisten für Waffen. Halte STRG
und Mausrad um sie durchzuscrollen, oder drücke
STRG + Zifferntaste um direkt zu wechseln.
Element.Original:
Press $FORWARD $BACKWARDS $STRAFE_LEFT $STRAFE_RIGHT and $UP $DOWN to use your thrusters.
Use Left Shift to slow down.
With the mouse wheel and number keys you can
select your weapon or tool from the hot bar.
There are 10 hotbars for weapons. Hold control
and mouse wheel scroll through them, or press
contol + number key to switch directly.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: This is the basic rail module. As a single block this module works like a docking module. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the \'Rail Docker\' to dock to this block.
Element.Original: This is the basic rail module. As a single block this module works like a docking module. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.
Element.Original:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.

Element.Translation: Zielgenauigkeit der KI (je höher der Wert desto genauer auf höherem Abstand. 10 = ca. 99 % Genauigkeit auf 10m)
Element.Original: how accurate the AI aims (the higher the value the more accurate vs distance. 10 = about 99% accuracy at 10m)

Element.Translation: The Cannon Barrel, when used in conjunction with a Cannon Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Cannon fires a simple projectile in a straight line. Cannons do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Cannon Barrel you want to output the shot, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Cannon Barrel, when used in conjunction with a Cannon Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Cannon fires a simple projectile in a straight line. Cannons do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Cannon Barrel you want to output the shot, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation:
Aktiviert den freien Zielmodus für alle Warptore auf dieser Struktur. 
Kein Ziel-Warptor ist benötigt, da jetzt alle Zielsektoren in Reichweite ausgewählt werden können.

Drücke %ACTIVATE im Warptorcomputer um einen Zielsektor zu setzen.
Element.Original:
Enables the free target mode for all warpgates on this structure. 
No target warpgate is required as you can now freely set any destination sector within range.

Press %ACTIVATE on a Warpgate Computer to set a target sector.

Element.Translation: WINDOWS(64 bit): Sound-Schleife (Lärm):\n Das Kopieren der OpenAL64.dll von \'..\\StarMade\\native\\windows\\x64\' in die beiden Pfade: \'..\\Windows\\System32\' und \'..\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\'\n scheint das Problem, nach einem Neustart des Systems, zu lösen
Element.Original: WINDOWS(64 bit): Sound looping (noise):\ncopying OpenAL64.dll from '..\\StarMade\\native\\windows\\x64' into both '..\\Windows\\System32' and '..\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\'\nand restarting the computer seems to fix the issue

Element.Translation: LINUX: Kein Sound\nMachen Sie einen Export, um die Verweispfade vor dem Start des Spiels zu erweitern:\n export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=\"$PWD/StarMade/native/linux:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH\"

Element.Translation: The Shield Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Shield Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Shield Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Shield Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Shield Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Shield Supply Computer is required for creating functioning Shield Supply systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Shield Supply Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Shield Supply Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Shield Supply Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation: The Missile Tube, when used in conjunction with a Missile Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Missile fires a dumb missile in a straight line. Missiles do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Missile Tube you want to output the missile, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Missile Tube, when used in conjunction with a Missile Computer, can create a basic but effective weapons system. The Missile fires a dumb missile in a straight line. Missiles do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their damage. You can also choose which block outputs the projectile by finding the Missile Tube you want to output the missile, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: The Docking Enhancer can be used to increase the size of the Docking Zone created by a Docking Module. To use them, simply connect them to the Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Module with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Docking Enhancers, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Docking Module.
Element.Original: The Docking Enhancer can be used to increase the size of the Docking Zone created by a Docking Module. To use them, simply connect them to the Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Module with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Docking Enhancers, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Docking Module.

Element.Translation:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.
Element.Original:
Race gate modules must form a 1 block deep loop to create a working Race Gate. 
To link your Race Gate controller to its Race Gates, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Link multiple Race Gates with each other to create a Race Track. Right click the destination Gate with a Marker Beam tool and then left click the source Gate with it.
To create a race on your Race Track. Go to gate you want as starting position and open its Gate Controller Menu. Press the “Create new race” button and fill in the details.

After that anyone can join the created list by clicking on it and pressing “Join Race”, you can also remove the race with the “Remove Race” button. 

When all racers are ready, link an activation controller or button to the starting gate’s controller. Sending a true signal will start the race. Every racer will see a marker which gate to go through first.

 Um den Controller mit den Modulen zu verbinden, wählen Sie zunächst den Controller mit %s und anschließend die einzelnen Module mit der Taste %s, 
 alternativ können auch alle gruppierten Module mit Umschalt+ $CONNECT_MODULE gewählt werden.

 Im Anschluss können Sie das System mit einer beliebigen Waffe verbinden,
 in dem Sie den Waffen-Controller mit dem eben erstellten Effekt-Controller verbinden.
 Dies ist manuell mit $SELECT_MODULE und $CONNECT_MODULE möglich, oder direkt im Waffen-Menü.


 Effekt:
%s

 Bitte beachten Sie, dass Sie Effekt- und Waffenmodule im Verhältnis 1:1 verbinden müssen um die volle Effekt-Wirkung zu erhalten.
 Die Anzahl verbundener Effekt-Module muss der Anzahl der Waffen-Module entsprechen.

 Wenn das System nicht mit einer Waffe verbunden ist, hat es einen defensiven Effekt der aktiviert werden kann.
 Platzieren sie den Computer in Ihrer Schnellleiste im Waffen-Menü
 und aktivieren Sie ihn:
Element.Original:
You can use this system to upgrade your weapons or to use defensively on your ship.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to a weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the effect controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.


Effect:
%s

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size. 
The amount of linked modules of your effect has to be the same amount of your weapon.

If not used linked to a weapon, 
the system has a defensive effect you can enable
Place the computer on your hotbar in the Weapons Menu
and activate it:

Element.Translation: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Dieser Computer kann an andere Waffen\nund Systeme (Kanonen, Stalen, Puls, Raketen)\nangeschlossen werden, um diese Waffe anzupassen. Verbinden mit %s am computer und %s an seinen modulen (oder Umschalt+ $CONNECT_MODULE für Gruppen)
Element.Original:
This controller can be connected to other weapons
and systems (cannon, beam, damage pulse, missile)
to customize your weapon.

To link your Controller to its Modules, press %s on the Controller, then %s on the individual modules, 
or alternatively Shift + $CONNECT_MODULE to mass select grouped modules.

Afterwards you can link it to another weapon by connecting the weapon controller you want to upgrade
with the weapon controller you just made.
You can do this manually with $SELECT_MODULE and $CONNECT_MODULE or in the Weapons Menu.

Note that for the full effect, 
you need to connect 1:1 in size.

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Threns - Roherz hat nutzliche Herstellungseigenschaften wenn es in eine leichter verwenbare Form gebracht wird. Etliche Technologien basieren auf diesen Erzen, sobald sie verarbeitet wurden.
Element.Original: Threns Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation:
This block is used to combat slow down on rails. 
There is a certain mass free to place on each rail, but in case that is reached, the rail movement will slow down immensly. 
Each 'Rail Mass Enhancer' adds more possible mass to all the rails on your structure but also require power to function.
Element.Original:
This block is used to combat slow down on rails. 
There is a certain mass free to place on each rail, but in case that is reached, the rail movement will slow down immensly. 
Each 'Rail Mass Enhancer' adds more possible mass to all the rails on your structure but also require power to function.

Element.Translation: Dies ist ein Multi-Slot. Es enthält mehrere Formen des gleichen Elements. \nDu kannst es in der Hotbar platzen und eine bestimmte Form mit dem Mausrad wählen\noder rechts-klicken Sie darauf und nehmen Sie eine bestimmte Form.
Element.Original: This is a Multi-Slot. It contains multiple shapes of the same item.\nYou can put it in your hotbar and select a specific shape with the mouse wheel\nor right click it and take a specific one.

Element.Translation: Zurzeit ist es nun erlaubt, Blöcke als Preis auszusetzen
Element.Original: It's currently now allowed to set block as price

Element.Translation: This is the rail rotation module. Whatever goes on to it will rotate by default 90 degrees, and then move on in the given direction if there is another rail block to go to. The degree of rotation can be modified by connecting activation blocks. Connect from the rail rotator up to 9 activation blocks. Each active block will add 45 degrees to its rotation. So it is possible to dynamically change the rotation by just activating and deactivating the activation blocks. Nine active blocks will result in a constant rotation.
Element.Original: This is the rail rotation module. Whatever goes on to it will rotate by default 90 degrees, and then move on in the given direction if there is another rail block to go to. The degree of rotation can be modified by connecting activation blocks. Connect from the rail rotator up to 9 activation blocks. Each active block will add 45 degrees to its rotation. So it is possible to dynamically change the rotation by just activating and deactivating the activation blocks. Nine active blocks will result in a constant rotation.

Element.Translation: Das ist das Abladeschienenmodul. An diesen Block zu docken wird alle Items aus den verbundenen Kisten des Andockers auf dem gedockten Schiff in die verbundenen Kisten dieses Blocks verlagern. Du kannst mehrere aneinanderhängen um eine Strecke zu bauen. Benutze den Schienen-Andocker um an diesen Block zu docken.
Element.Original: This is the unload rail module. Docking to a block like this will pull items from the chests that are connected to the rail docker of the docked ship to the chests that are connected to this rail block. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation: The Camera provides another viewpoint. They are automatically connected to the main Ship Core when placed. To cycle through cameras, you can use the Left and Right arrow keys. Cameras also are capable of outputing a docking beam, allowing an alternate docking beam output than from the core itself.
Element.Original: The Camera provides another viewpoint. They are automatically connected to the main Ship Core when placed. To cycle through cameras, you can use the Left and Right arrow keys. Cameras also are capable of outputing a docking beam, allowing an alternate docking beam output than from the core itself.

Element.Original: A basic circuit that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Distanz für hohe Reichweite 2 NICHT VERFÜGBAR

Das dort drüben ist ein kleines, vorgefertigtes Schiff. Der Kern ist in der Mitte.
Du kannst den Kern betreten indem du 'R' drückst und die Kontrolle über das Schiff übernehmen.
Element.Original:
That over there is a small pre-built ship. The core is at the centre.
You can enter the core by pressing 'R', and take control of the ship.

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation:
Ich habe euch alles gelehrt was ich weiß. 
Spreche mit NPC-02 für die nächsten Schritte in diesem Tutorial! 

Viel Spaß!
Element.Original:
I've taught you everything I know.
Talk to NPC-02 for the next steps in the tutorial!

Have a good time!

Element.Translation:
Blockanzahl ist nicht alles, die Architektur und das Design spielen auch eine wichtige Rolle bei der Effektivität
und Effizienz jeder Struktur in StarMade.

Zur Zeit reden wir nur über Schiffe.
Element.Original:
Block count is not all that matters, the architecture and design also has an important role on the effectiveness
and efficiency of every structure in StarMade.

For now we are only talking about Ships.

Element.Translation:
Jedes Schiff hat einen Kern. Der Kern ist das Herz des Schiffes, und ohne ihn wird das Schiff nicht
funktionieren, also beschütze ihn um jeden Preis.

Zusätzlich dient der Kernblock als Steuerzentrale deines Schiffs,
also achte darauf während du baust.
Element.Original:
Every ship has a core. A core is the heart of a ship, and without it the ship will not
function, so be sure to protect it at any cost.

Additionally the core block will serve as your vessel's point of control,
so be sure you keep that in mind when building.

Element.Translation:
Grüße %s, ich bin "NPC-01"! 

Ich unterrichte Sie über eines der wichtigsten Dinge im Universum von StarMade: Schiffe!
Element.Original:
Greetings %s, I'm "NPC-01"!

I will teach you about one of the most important things in the StarMade Universe: Ships!

Element.Translation:
The sensor blocks is used to check the condition of a linked system.
It requires a touching activation block which will be used as output.
It also requires a block linked to the sensor to trigger a check. A clock that periodically sends a signal to the sensor is recommended.

Link the sensor to any of these blocks:
- power reactors
- power auxiliaries
- shields
- doors/force fields
- radar jammer
- cloaker
- jump drive
- cargo

The sensor has a default state of 0%. Meaning that it will trigger for blocks in an "off" state or for systems that are depleted such as 0 power or 0 volume used.

You can link the sensor to a number of activation modules to set any % other than 0. It works like a rail speed controller using ratios. 3 true linked activation modules out of 6 will set it to 50%.
Element.Original:
The sensor blocks is used to check the condition of a linked system.
It requires a touching activation block which will be used as output.
It also requires a block linked to the sensor to trigger a check. A clock that periodically sends a signal to the sensor is recommended.

Link the sensor to any of these blocks:
- power reactors
- power auxiliaries
- shields
- doors/force fields
- radar jammer
- cloaker
- jump drive
- cargo

The sensor has a default state of 0%. Meaning that it will trigger for blocks in an "off" state or for systems that are depleted such as 0 power or 0 volume used.

You can link the sensor to a number of activation modules to set any % other than 0. It works like a rail speed controller using ratios. 3 true linked activation modules out of 6 will set it to 50%.

Increases the top speed of your ship.

Element.Translation: So, nun lass uns diese Kanone bauen!

Element.Original: Good work! You see that it now has an orange\npulsating border around it. That means it's\ncurrently selected.

Platziere jetzt ein paar 'Kanonenrohr-Module'. Sie können sie

Place some 'cannon barrel modules' now. You can place them
all next to each other for a single, high-damage
beam, or place them separate from one another to
shoot multiple projectiles at once.

Element.Original:
This is the weapon panel!
You can assign controllers to your
hotbar here, as well as manage
advanced combined weapons.

Element.Translation: Fast fertig.\nWenn du nicht bereits so weit bist,\nwechsle nun mit der Leertaste in den Flugmodus.

Element.Translation:
Basic enhancement for the Short Range Scanner. When the Scanner is active, it provides extra information of all nearby entities.
Your scanner strength versus the stealth strength of your target, decides how much information you receive and what it counters of a Stealth Drive.

- Disables jamming
- Weapon group information
- Chamber group information
- Reactor group information

If enabled on the server, this chamber will also enable the Short Range Scanner on your structure. 
Otherwise it's already available.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Forcefields are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: The Power Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Power Drain Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Drain Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Drain Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Drain Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Drain Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;Start
Element.Translation: Willkommen zum Herstellungstutorial. \nHier wird das Herstellungs- und das\nFabriksystem von StarMade erklärt.
Element.Original: Welcome to the Crafing Tutorial.\nIt will explain StarMade's\ncrafting and factory system.

Element.Translation: A type of vegetation covered in sharp spines.
Element.Original: A type of vegetation covered in sharp spines.

Element.Translation:
A shipyard has several features. To access them, just hit ‘R’ (Activate/Open) on the shipyard, and press the “Place Order” Button.
Here you can choose from several commands depending on the shipyard’s current state (e.g. if a ship is docked or not)

The Shipyard computer must be linked to both Shipyard Modules and exactly one Core Anchor to function.
Link the computer and modules using C and V.
Element.Original:
A shipyard has several features. To access them, just hit ‘R’ (Activate/Open) on the shipyard, and press the “Place Order” Button.
Here you can choose from several commands depending on the shipyard’s current state (e.g. if a ship is docked or not)

The Shipyard computer must be linked to both Shipyard Modules and exactly one Core Anchor to function.
Link the computer and modules using C and V.

Element.Translation: The Turret Docking Enhancer can be used for the Turret Docking Module, much like the Docking Enhancer can be for the Docking Module. To use them, you must simply connect them to the Turret Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Unit with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Turret Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Turret Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Turret Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Turret Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Turret Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Turret Docking Enhancer, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Turret Docking Module.
Element.Original: The Turret Docking Enhancer can be used for the Turret Docking Module, much like the Docking Enhancer can be for the Docking Module. To use them, you must simply connect them to the Turret Docking Module whose zone you want to increase by selecting the Unit with C, and then using V to connect each Enhancer. As with Weapons, and other blocks that can be connected. The Turret Docking Enhancers do not have to be adjacent to the Turret Docking Module. Alternatively, you can lay a Turret Docking Module down, select it with C, and then each Turret Docking Enhancer you put down afterwards will be automatically connected to the Turret Docking Module. As of now, there is no need to orient Turret Docking Enhancer, as they will increase the Docking Zone all around, no matter which way they are facing, or where they are put in correlation to the Turret Docking Module.

Element.Translation: Das ist das Ladeschienenmodul. An diesen Block zu docken wird alle Items aus den verbundenen Kisten dieses Blocks in die verbundenen Kisten des Andockers auf dem gedockten Schiff verlagern. Du kannst mehrere aneinanderhängen um eine Strecke zu bauen. Benutze den Schienen-Andocker um an diesen Block zu docken.
Element.Original: This is the load rail module. Docking to a block like this will push items from the connected chests of this rail block to the chests that are connected to the rail docker of the docked ship. You can put more of them together to make a track. Use the 'Rail Docker' to dock to this block.

Element.Translation:
Wenn Sie auf 'Neuer Eintrag' klicken, speichert das
Spiel das momentane Schiff in den Katalog.
Als Admin oder beim Einzelspiel können Sie
auch den Befehl '/save namedesschiffes' im Chat verwenden
um Schiffe oder sogar Stationen
(Stationen werden nicht gelistet, können aber mit dem '/load' Befehl geladen werden)
Element.Original:
If you click on 'Create new entry' the game will save
your current entered ship into the catalog.
As admin or during singleplayer you can
also use the command '/save nameofship' in chat
to save ships and even stations (stations will not
be listed but can be loaded with the '/load' command)

Element.Translation:
'Im lokalen Katalog speichern' ist nur
im Multiplayer relevant. Es speichert das Schiff
nicht im Serverkatalog sondern in Ihrem
lokalen Einzelspieler Katalog.
Element.Original:
'Save in local catalog' is only relevant
in multiplayer, it will not save the ship
in the server's catalog but in your local
singleplayer catalog.

Element.Translation:
Sie können auch Ihre lokalen Baupläne auf den Server hochladen
um sie dort
kaufen zu können. Sie und die Server admins werden
 darauf Zugreifen können also seien Sie sicher dass Sie das wollen.
Element.Original:
You can also upload your local blueprints to the server
so you can buy them on it.
You and the server admins will have access to it,
so be sure you are OK with that.

Element.Translation:
Katalogeinträge haben Berechtigungen
die festlegen wer sie herbeirufen kann: Andere(jeder)/Fraktion/Basis.
Es gibt eine vierte Option 'Feind nutzbar' für admins oder im Einzelspiel
um ein Schiff rufbar für Piraten und die Handelsgilde zu machen.
Element.Original:
Catalog entries have permissions
that determine who can spawn them: others(everyone)/faction/homebase.
There is a fourth option 'enemy usable' for admins or in singleplayer to
make a ship spawnable for pirates and the trading guild.

Element.Translation:
Der Katalog zeichnet Schiffsbaupläne auf.
Wenn Sie im Einzelspiel einen Bauplan speichern, wird er
im StarMade/blueprints Ordner abgelegt.
Auf einem Server erscheint er dann
im Ordner des Serverbesitzers.
Element.Original:
The catalog keeps track of ship blueprints.
When saving a blueprint in singleplayer they will appear
in your StarMade/blueprints folder.
When you save them on a server they will appear
in the server owner's folder.

A pearlescent crystal composite. These blocks are byproducts of refining crystal shards, combining extranious substrates into versatile crystal lattices that are then melded into a useful crystal block.

Element.Translation: Erstmal must du Verbindung für mich reparieren.\nDiese Kanone solte automatisch schießen, aber sie sind nicht verbunden.
Element.Original: First, you need to fix this connection for me. This cannon should fire automatically,\nbut they are not linked.

(ADMIN) Erwartung:
%s
Physik unmöglichkeit erkannt (dif)
führe aufräumen auf Objekt aus um zu recovern "..."
Element.Original:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (dif)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...

Element.Translation:
Wenn du also einen Kanonen-Computer (den Controller) platzierst, 
werden die Kanonenrohre (Module), die damit verbunden sind, feuern, wenn du den Controller benutzt!

Der Computer kontrolliert alle Kanonen als ein Objekt in der Schnellzugriffsleiste.
Element.Original:
So if you place a Cannon Computer (the controller) down,
the cannon barrels (modules) that are connected to it will fire when you use the controller!

It's the computer that controls the cannons as one object on the quick bar.

Element.Translation:
So funktioniert's:
Fast alle Funktionsblöcke bestehen aus zwei Typen:
 -einem Controller
 -ein Modul

Jedes Modul auf einer Struktur wird von dem Controller gesteuert, mit dem es verbunden ist.
Element.Original:
Here's how it works:
Almost all functional blocks come in two types: A controller and modules.

Each module on a structure is used by the controller it is connected to.

Element.Translation:
Dies ist das System das jeder in unserem Universum nutzt: das Steuerungssystem! 
Das Verstehen dieses Systems ist der Schlüssel um alle Funktionen dieser Welt zu nutzen!
Element.Original:
Now this is the system everyone in our universe is using: the controller system!
Understanding this system is the key to make anything functional in this world!

Element.Translation:
SERVER ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please send in server logs.
Element.Original:
SERVER ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please send in server logs.

Element.Translation:
Hier sind einige bekannte Beispiele:

- Ein "Kanonen-Computer" als Sklave erhöht die Feuerrate.
- Ein "Raketen Computer" als Sklave erhöht die Projektilanzahl.
- Ein "Schaden-Strahl-Computer" erhöht die Reichweite und/oder Geschwindigkeit.
- Ein "Schaden-Impuls-Computer" erhöht den ausgeteilten Schaden.

Es gibt eine Menge kombinationen.

Ich habe ein Beispiel für dich dort drüben aufgebaut! Wir werden diese Kanone zu Schrotflinte verwandeln.
Element.Original:
Here are some of the most common examples:

- A 'Cannon Computer' slave will increase firing speed.
- A 'Missile Computer' slave will fire more projectiles.
- A 'Damage Beam Computer' will increase range and/or speed.
- A 'Damage Pulse Computer' will increase the damage dealt.

There are a lot of combinations.

I prepared an example for you over there! We are going to turn this cannon into a shotgun.

Element.Translation:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (miss)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...
Element.Original:
(ADMIN) Exception:
%s
physics inconsistency detected (miss)
Performing cleanup on object to recover...

Element.Translation:
So geht's:

Falls du zwei Computer, von denen jeder mit seinen eigenen Modulen verbunden ist, hast,
so kannst du beide Computer miteinander verbinden, um eine stärkere Kombi-Waffe zu erschaffen.

Du wirst dadurch allerdings nicht mehr in der Lage sein, beide Waffen unabhängig voneinander zu nutzen.

Die genauen Auswirkungen der Kombi-Waffe hängen von den zwei genutzten Computern und deren Reihenfolge ab.
Element.Original:
This is how it works:

If you have two computers with each having their own connected modules, you can actually link
those two computers together to create a powerful combination weapon.

You forfeit the ability to fire both weapons separately for a single, more powerful weapon

Depending on which weapon system you "slave" to another, the results will differ.

Element.Translation:
CLIENT FEHLER
Doppelte Charakter Aktualisierung
erkannt:
%s
Bitte starten Sie neu und senden Sie die Protokolle/Log Dateien.
Element.Original:
CLIENT ERROR
Double character update
detected:
%s
Please restart and send in logs.

Element.Translation:
Diese information kann dir einen Vorteil gegenüber deinen Gegnern bieten, also hör gut zu:

Wie du vielleicht mitbekommen hast, als du die Schiffe dorthin geflogen hast,
die Laser-Kanonen haben eine ziemlich lange Nachladezeit.
Es gibt einen Weg sie schneller zu machen!
Und das Beste ist, du kannst dieses Wissen für alle Waffen nutzen.
Element.Original:
This information can give you an edge over your opponent, so listen closely:

As you may have noticed when you flew those ships back there, the laser cannon has a fairly
long reload time. There is actually a way to change that!
And the best thing is, you can apply the same knowledge to any other weapon out there.

Element.Translation:
Hallo! Willkommen in der Klasse für Fortgeschrittene! 

Ich habe von NPC-02 gehört, dass du schon dein erstes Schiff gebaut hast! 
Das ist wirklich beeindruckend!
Element.Original:
Hello there! Welcome to the advanced class!

I've heard from NPC-02 that you have already built your first ship!
That's really impressive!

Element.Translation: WERFT_ERROR:\nKritischer Server Fehler\nKein Slot weil Raum reserviert

Element.Translation:
Ändert die Schilddichte um weniger Schaden von schadensniedrigen Waffen zu erleiden.
 Dies führt jedoch dazu, dass schadenshohe Waffen durch den Schild durchgehen.

Sehr effizient gegen schnell feuernde Waffen.
Element.Original:
Changes your shield density to take less damage from low damage weapons.
This makes the shield more vulnerable to high damage weapons though.

Efficient against fast firing weapons.

Element.Translation: This is a rail docking module. It is used to dock to a basic rail, a rail rotator, or a Rail Turret Axis. The arrow on its top side works like a magnet aligning itself with the arrow on the block you are docking to. For each docker you can set a docking beam from within your weapon panel. There is no restriction to the size and mass in docking, except overlapping areas are not allowed.
Element.Original: This is a rail docking module. It is used to dock to a basic rail, a rail rotator, or a Rail Turret Axis. The arrow on its top side works like a magnet aligning itself with the arrow on the block you are docking to. For each docker you can set a docking beam from within your weapon panel. There is no restriction to the size and mass in docking, except overlapping areas are not allowed.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateE
Element.Translation: Das Spiel entscheidet zwischen FFA und Team Deathmatch anhand der Spielerzahl in jeder Fraktion. Der Modus mit den meisten Spielern wird gewählt. Drücke \'$LEADERBOARD\' um die Führungstabelle des Gefechtsmodus zu sehen.
Element.Original:
The game will decide between FFA or Team Deathmatch
by looking at the player count in each faction.
The mode with the most players will be chosen.
Press '$LEADERBOARD' to see the Battle Mode leaderboard.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateD
Element.Translation: Zum Kampf müssen Spieler besonderen Fraktionen beitreten: Team- oder FFA-Fraktionen.
Element.Original: To battle, the players have to join a\nspecific faction: Team factions or the FFA faction.

Element.Translation:
Optional Block to direct the energy stream 
between your stabilizer and a main reactor.

Connect the nodes to create a path. The stream will
enter from the main reactor to the closest starting
point, and go from the end point to the stabilizer.
Element.Original:
Optional Block to direct the energy stream 
between your stabilizer and a main reactor.

Connect the nodes to create a path. The stream will
enter from the main reactor to the closest starting
point, and go from the end point to the stabilizer.

Element.Translation: Übernehme die Systemkontrolle für die Fraktion

Wilkommen beim KI-Tutorial.
Dieses Tutorial wird dir
die KI-Funktionen in StarMade
und wie du sie verwendest beibringen.
Element.Original:
Welcome to the AI Tutorial.
This tutorial will teach you about
the AI functionality in StarMade
and how to use it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateB
Element.Translation: In StarMade erfordert das Bauen und Sammeln von Rohstoffen Zeit. Der Gefechtsmodus erlaubt Spielern an Jeder-gegen-Jeden oder Team-Gefechten teilzunehmen ohne sich um den Rest kümmern zu müssen.
Element.Original:
In StarMade, building and
gathering resources takes time,
Battle Mode lets people duel in a
death match or team battle without having
to worry about the rest.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateC
Element.Translation: Administratoren können den Gefechtsmodus freischalten indem sie die server.cfg Datei bearbeiten. Falls die \"Use_Personal_Sectors\"-Option auf Wahr gesetzt ist hat jeder Spieler seinen eigenen Sektor den er nicht verlassen kann, erhält aber einen unbegrenzten Laden der niemals ausverkauft ist und keine Credits erfordert. Das ermöglicht dir ein PvP-Schiff zu bauen.
Element.Original:
Admins can enable Battle Mode by editing
the server.cfg file.
If the "Use_Personal_Sectors" option is set to 'true',
each player will have its own sector he cannot leave,
but he will be provided with an infinite shop that
never runs out of supplies nor requires credits to use,
allowing you to build a PVP ship.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_What is and how to use Battle Mode;StateA
Element.Translation: Gefechtsmodus ist ein Untermodus für Starmade als einfacher Test für zukünftige Modi.\nIm Grunde ändert er das Spiel in ein reines Kampfspiel.
Element.Original:
Battle Mode is a sub-mode for StarMade
as a simple test for future modes.
It essentially turns the game into a
arcade fighter.

Element.Translation: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Element.Translation: The Turret Docking Module functions very similarly to the Docking Module. Except that it allows the docked item to freely rotate, thus enabling turret capabilites. All the other rules and limitations of the Docking Module still apply. You can orient the block and thus the zone, and there must be no other blocks than the docked item in the zone.
Element.Original: The Turret Docking Module functions very similarly to the Docking Module. Except that it allows the docked item to freely rotate, thus enabling turret capabilites. All the other rules and limitations of the Docking Module still apply. You can orient the block and thus the zone, and there must be no other blocks than the docked item in the zone.

Element.Translation: Erhöht die Menge an Schaden die von Panzerung absorbiert wird.
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any kinetic based damage.

Element.Translation: The Push Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Push Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Push Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Push Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Push Pulse Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.
Element.Original: The Push Pulse Computer is required for creating functioning Push Pulse systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Push Pulse Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Once placed, you can select/deselect it with C, and link Push Pulse Modules using V while it is selected and you are looking at a Push Pulse Module. $MAINCOMBI Press $ACTIVATE to get in/out of the Computer.

Element.Translation:
Möchten Sie Ihre Systeme neu starten?
Das wird alle Ausfälle durch wenig HP beheben
und setzt die HP entsprechend Ihrer derzeitigen Blöcke.
Das wir KEINE Blöcke reparieren oder auffüllen.
Neustart erfolgt sofort, aber er wird %s Credits kosten
Sie besitzen derzeit %s Credits
Element.Original:
Do you want to reboot your systems?
This will remove any system failures from low hp
and it will set the HP according to your current blocks.
This will NOT replenish or repair any blocks.
Rebooting will be instant, but it will cost %s Credits
You currently have %s Credits

Element.Translation: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: The Power Supply Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Supply Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Supply Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Supply Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Supply Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.
Element.Original: The Power Supply Module, when used in conjunction with a Power Supply Computer, can create a basic but effective power transfer system. The Power Supply Module fires a transfer beam in a straight line. Power Supply Modules do benefit from being grouped together (being adjacent to one another), increasing their transfer rate. You can also choose which block outputs the effect by finding the Power Supply Module you want to output the effect, and pressing $ACTIVATE on it.

Element.Translation: These forcefield modules can used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Nach dem Platzieren der Makrofabrik wirst du feststellen dass sie Energie benötigt. Du kannst diese Energie bereitstellen indem Du mit deinem persönlichen Energiestrahler darauf schiesst, oder falls Du welche besitzt, mit Energiereaktor Blöcken. Wenn nicht, solltest Du schnell welche in der neuen Fabrik herstellen.
Element.Original:
After you placed a macro factory you will see
that it needs power to function. You can provide
that power by shooting it with your personal power
supply beam, or if you have them, placing down
power recharge blocks. If you don't have any power blocks
then it should focus to craft some in your new factory.

Element.Translation:
Katalog aus einer anderen Welt kopieren?

aber alle Katalogeinträge werden zurückgesetzt. (deren Berechtigungen. Eigentümer, Piraten nutzbar, etc.).

Copy catalog from another world?

Pressing cancel will not delete your blueprints,
but all catalog entries will reset their permissions (owner, pirate usable, etc).

Element.Translation:
Warning: Your reactor stabilization is less than 50%. This negatively impacts the performance of your reactor, and causes extra damage to your reactor when it is hit.

Place some stabilizers a distance away from your main reactor to increase your stabilization.
The minimal distance is determined by the size of your main reactor. If you plan on building the stabilizers closer, you will need to place more of them.
Element.Original:
Warning: Your reactor stabilization is less than 50%. This negatively impacts the performance of your reactor, and causes extra damage to your reactor when it is hit.

Place some stabilizers a distance away from your main reactor to increase your stabilization.
The minimal distance is determined by the size of your main reactor. If you plan on building the stabilizers closer, you will need to place more of them.

Element.Translation: Öffne die Makrofabrik mit $ACTIVATE und klicke auf\nProduktion ändern. Du kannst den Filter benutzen und z.B. \'Energie\' eingeben um schnell die Energiegeneratoren im Drop-Down Menü zu finden. Nachdem der Generator ausgewählt wurde, kannst du auf \'Graph\' klicken, um zu sehen was dafür benötigt wird.
Element.Original:
Open the macro factory with $ACTIVATE and click on
change production. You can use the filter and type
for example 'power' to quickly find power modules
in the drop down menu. After you chose the power recharge
module, you can click on graph to see exactly
what you need for making that block.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateI
Element.Translation: Wenn Du entweder 20 Metallgeflechte oder Schaltkreise hast, drücke den \'craft macro\' Knopf um deine erste Makrofabrik zu bauen. Die Makrofabrik erzeugt jeden herstellbaren Block im Spiel. Der Block kann nur in einer Station oder auf einem Planeten gesetzt werden.
Element.Original:
When you have either 20 metal meshes or circuits,
press on the 'craft macro' button to craft your first macro
factory. The macro factory makes every craftable
block in the game. You can only place this block
on a station or a planet.

Element.Translation: Sie sind nicht in einer Fraktion. \nWollen Sie dieses Objekt auf Neutral zurücksetzen?
Element.Original: You are not in any faction.\nDo you want to reset this object to neutral?

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateL
Element.Translation: Du kannst natürlich mehrere Fabriken bauen die all diese Schritte auf einmal ausführen. Zudem kannst Du Fabriken verbinden: Drücke $SELECT_MODULE auf der Fabrik die Material aus anderen Fabriken entnehmen soll und drücke $CONNECT_MODULE auf den Fabriken mit denen Du verbinden willst.
Element.Original:
You can of course craft multiple factories
to do all these steps at once.
Furthermore you are able to link factories:
Press $SELECT_MODULE on the factory you want to be able
to take needed materials out for other factories and
press $CONNECT_MODULE on those to connect them with it.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateK
Element.Translation: WICHTIG: Die Fabrik wird nur den letzten Schritt des Graphen erledigen. Jeder Schritt davor benötigt seine eigene Fabrik. In diesem Beispiel verbraucht die Fabrik nur Metallgeflecht und \'Aktives Varat Prozesserz\' das Du in einer anderen Fabrik herstellen musst (oder diese Fabrik darauf umstellen).
Element.Original:
IMPORTANT: The factory will only do the last step
of the graph. Every step below that will require it's
own factory. In this example the only thing that
this factory will consume is Metal Mesh and
'Active Varat Processore', which you need to produce
in a separate factory (or change the production on this one).

Element.Translation: Bitte docken sie zuerst dieses Schiff aus, ansonsten\nwird die Fraktionsangehörigkeit des Schiffes überschrieben!
Element.Original: Please undock this ship first, or\nfaction would be overwritten!

Element.Translation:
Blöcke auf einem geschädigtem Schiff
kann zu Negativen Effekten führen.
Bitte starten Sie die Schiffssysteme neu, bevor Sie
neue Blöcke setzen.
Element.Original:
Placing blocks on a damaged ship
can lead to negative effects!
Please reboot the ship before placing
any blocks.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateM
Element.Translation: Eine Fabrik entnimmt benötigtes Material aus allen Fabriken die mit ihr verbunden sind.\nDas erlaubt die Herstellung eines kompletten Produktbaums. Du legts die Rohstoffe in die unterste Stufe der Kette und entnimmst das fertige Endprodukt am Ende.
Element.Original:
A factory will take ingredients needed from
all the factories that are connected to it.
This basically enables you to rebuild a whole
crafting tree. Then you can put in raw resources
in the bottom and get the high level product on the top.

Element.Translation: Sie haben keine Mannschaft in diesem Slot.
Element.Original: You don't have crew in this slot.

Element.Translation: Kann sich nicht bewegen: Kein Ziel!
Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Du kannst nicht mehr als\nfünf aktive Einladungen\nsenden.
Element.Original: You can only have five\ninvitations pending\nat the same time.
Please connect the block\nthe marker is pointing to!
Please select the block\nthe marker is pointing to!

Element.Translation: zeige keine Nachricht beim beitreten oder verlassen
Regeneriert die Panzerungs HP langsam, erhöht aber den Energieverbrauch.
Element.Original: Increases the amount of damage your armor blocks can withstand from any environmental based damage.

Element.Translation: Änderung nicht möglich:\nDu bist in keiner Fraktion.
Element.Original: Cannot modify:\nYou are not in any faction!

Element.Translation: Deine Fraktion ist beschädigt und existiert nicht!
Element.Original: Your faction is corrupted\nand does not exist!

Element.Translation: Gib den Spielernamen ein, den du einladen möchtest.
Element.Original: Enter Name of the player you want to invite

Element.Translation:
Du kannst für den Anzeigeblock verschiedene Stile verwenden.
Benutze Tags wie <style></style> um Farbe und Font auszuwählen
z.B. <style>c=#FF0000,f=1</style> -> roter Text mittlerer Schriftgröße.
f=x (x aus 0,1,2 für Schriftgröße)
c=x (x muss der Hex-Wert einer Farbe sein (wie in css/html) beginnend mit #)


Platzhalter die im Text verwendet werden können:
%s

Wenn Du einen Aktivierungsblock neben diesen Block setzt und diesen mit einem anderen Anzeigeblock verbindest, wird dessen Inhalt durch diesen ersetzt.
Es gibt einige weitere Methoden den Inhalt einer verbundenen Anzeige zu bearbeiten:
* '[PASSWORD]text': Der Text dieses Blocks wird nicht angezeigt.
* '[ADD]text': Der Text nach [ADD] wird dem Inhalt der anderen Anzeige hinzugefügt. ([ADD] muss am Anfang stehen)
* '[DEL]Anzahl': entfernt Anzahl Zeichen des verbundenen Blocks ([DEL] muss am Anfang stehen)
* '[REPLACEFIRST]regexp[WITH]Ersatztext': verwende Java-konforme reguläre Ausdrücke um Text zu ersetzen ([REPLACEFIRST] muss am Anfang stehen)
* '[REPLACEALL]regexp[WITH]Ersatztext': verwende Java-konforme reguläre Ausdrücke um alle Texte zu ersetzen ([REPLACEALL] muss am Anfang stehen)

Du kannst auch den Sensor-Block verwenden um zu prüfen ob zwei Anzeigen den selben Text zeigen. Verbinde einfach den Sensorblock mit zwei Anzeigeblöcken. Das [PASSWORD]-tag wird beim Vergleich ignoriert.
Element.Original:
You can use different kinds of styles for your display block.
Use a header like <style></style> to select font and color
e.g. <style>c=#FF0000,f=1</style> -> red text with medium font size.
f=x (x can be 0,1,2 for font sizes)
c=x (x has to be a hex code for font (used in css/html) starting with #)


Variables that can be placed inside the text:
%s

If you place an activation block next to this block and connect that block
to another display, the content of that display will be replaced with this one.
There are several other methods to edit the content of the connected display:
* '[PASSWORD]text': The text in this block will not show up.
* '[ADD]text': The text after [ADD] is added to the existing text of the connected block ([ADD] must be in the very front)
* '[DEL]number': Removes an amount of characters from the connected block ([DEL] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEFIRST]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEFIRST] must be in the very front)
* '[REPLACEALL]regexp[WITH]replacement': use java conform regular expressions to replace specific text ([REPLACEALL] must be in the very front)

You can also use the sensor block to check if two display blocks have equal text content. Just connect the sensor block to two display blocks as input. The [password] tag is ignored when comparing text.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateC
Element.Translation: Das andere System verwendet Baupläne.\nBaupläne legen nur feste Produktionslinien fest.\nZum Beispiel: 10 beliebige Erzkapseln ergeben ein Metallgitter.
Element.Original: The other system is using recipes.\nRecipes just determine fixed product lines.\nFor example: 10 of any ore capsule makes a meta mesh.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateD
Element.Translation: Genug Theorie. Hier sehen Sie wie Sie mit nichts\nals Ihrem persönlichen Energiestrahl\nbeginnen.
Element.Original: Enough theory for now. Here is how you start\nwith absolutely nothing but your initial\npersonal power beam.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateA
Element.Translation:
Das Herstellen im StarMade basiert auf einem "Konsistenz" System. 
Jedes herstellbare Element hat eine Menge von
anderen Elementen aus denen es gemacht ist. Diese anderen
Elemente haben wieder andere Elemente aus denen
sie gemacht sind und so weiter. 
Du kannst dieses System mit einem Baum der Äste hat vergleichen.
Element.Original:
Crafting in StarMade is based on a "consistence" system.
Every craftable element has an amount of
other elements it is made from. These other
elements again have other elements they are
made off and so forth.
You can compare this system with a tree that has branches.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateB
Element.Translation: Konsistenzbäume haben keine Schleifen.\nEin Element (die Wurzel) ist niemals\nin einem Ast seines eigenen Handwerksbaums.
Element.Original: Consistence trees do not loop, so\nan element (the tree's root) is never in any\nof the branches of its own crafting tree.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateG
Element.Translation:
Lege eine Art Splitter oder Erz hinein und lasse
den zweiten Platz frei(das verarbeitete Produkt verwendet diesen Platz).
Nach kurzer Zeit solltest Du eine Menge Kapseln dieses Typs erhalten.
Lege diese in dein Inventar.
Element.Original:
Put one type of shards or ores in it and leave
the second slot empty (the processed product will use this slot).
After a short time, you should be
getting a lot of capsules from that type.
Place those in your inventory.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateH
Element.Translation:
Nachdem Du einige Kapseln hergestellt hast
klicke auf den 'Micro'-Knopf im Inventar und
setze sie hinein. Du brauchst 10 Kapseln beliebigen Typs
um entweder Metallgeflechte(Erzkapseln) oder Schaltkreise(Splitterkapseln) herzustellen. Diese beiden sind Grundmaterial der meisten Blöcke in StarMade.
Element.Original:
After you made some capsules, click on
the 'Micro' button in your inventory and place
them there. You need 10 capsules of any(!)
type to produce either metal meshes (ore capsules),
or circuits (shard capsules).
Those two are the base ingredients for most of
the blocks in StarMade.

Element.Translation: Increases the strength of your Jump Inhibitor.
Element.Original: Increases the strength of your Jump Inhibitor.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateE
Element.Translation:
Rohstoffe in StarMade gibt es in zwei Gruppen:
Kristallscherben und Erze. Jeder Planetenteil
hat zwei zufällige Rohstoffe, während die Rohstoffe
auf Asteroiden je Typ vorgegeben sind.
Sie finden verschieden Arten
 Asteroide abhängig von der Entfernung zwischen dem Sektor und dem Stern.
Element.Original:
StarMade's raw resources exist in two groups:
Crystal shards and ores. Each planet part
has two random resources, while the resources
on asteroids are set per type. You'll find
different types of asteroids depending on
the distance between the sector and the star.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the crafting system;StateF
Element.Translation:
Zum beginnen, sammeln Sie einige Roherze
durch Bergung mit einem einfachen Schiff oder
als Astronaut. Danach öffnen Sie ihr Inventar mit $INVENTORY_PANEL und klicken
 den 'Kapsel herstellen' Knopf. Das öffnet Ihre persönliche
Kapselfabrik. Sie können auch einen Fabrik-Block
bauen der schneller und effizienter ist.
Element.Original:
To start, collect some raw ore by salvaging
some resources with a basic ship or as astronaut.
After you've done that, open your inventory with $INVENTORY_PANEL and click the
'Craft Capsule' button. This will open your personal
capsule factory. You can also craft a factory block
that is faster and more efficient.

Element.Translation: Missile storage depleted!\nIncrease missile storage by placing missile capacity modules on your structure.
Element.Original: Missile storage depleted!\nIncrease missile storage by placing missile capacity modules on your structure.

Element.Translation: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: An advanced circuit that\'s manufactured from Varat crystals.
Element.Original: An advanced circuit that's manufactured from Varat crystals.

Element.Translation: Zercaner - Roherz hat nutzliche Herstellungseigenschaften wenn es in eine leichter verwenbare Form gebracht wird. Etliche Technologien basieren auf diesen Erzen, sobald sie verarbeitet wurden.
Element.Original: Zercaner Ore has useful manufacturing properties if refined into a more readily usable state. Several technologies are based upon the use of these ores once refined.

Element.Translation: A wedge of Parseen Crystal. It\'s white in colour and emits a soft glow.
Element.Original: A wedge of Parseen Crystal. It's white in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation:
Markierstrahl

Rechtsklick -> markieren
Linksklick -> Markierung übertragen
Element.Original:
Marker Beam
Current Marking On: %s

Right click -> mark
Left click -> enter marker informatinon

Tried to spawn ship with more than the
allowed amount of restricted block (e.g. faction block)
%s in %s
