Element.Original:
Tried to spawn ship with more than the
allowed amount of restricted block (e.g. faction block)
%s in %s
by %s

Element.Translation: Handel abgebrochen, weil Flotte verloren wurde!
Element.Original: Trade canceled because fleet was lost!

Element.Translation: Entity %s wants to pull items via your rail blocks. Allow?
Element.Original: Entity %s wants to pull items via your rail blocks. Allow?

Element.Translation: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.
Element.Original: Simple to create, Light Rods are an easy way to add some lighting to the area.

Element.Translation: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Erhöht die Stabilisierungsrate Ihres aktiven Reaktors. Dieser Block verliert an Effizienz, je näher er dem aktiven Reaktor kommt. \ Njede Reaktorgröße (Level) hat einen optimalen Abstand, in dem die Effizienz Ihrer Stabilisierung einen maximalen Wert erreicht. \ N \ r \ n \ rWenn Ihre Stabilisierung zu niedrig ist, du wirst die Energieerzeugung reduziert haben. \ n \ rDer Reaktor und seine Kammern sind ebenfalls sehr reaktiv, es sei denn, du hast 100% oder mehr Stabilisierung. \ nWenn du Schaden erleidest, erleiden deine Reaktorkomponenten zusätzlichen Schaden durch interne Explosionen. \ n \ r \ n \ rEs wird empfohlen, mehr als 100% Stabilisierung zu haben, um im Kampf zusätzlichen Schaden zu vermeiden.
Element.Original:
Increases the Stabilization rating of your active Reactor. This block loses efficiency the closer it gets to the Active reactor.
Each Reactor size (level) has an optimal distance where the efficiency of your stabilization reaches a maximum value.

If your Stabilization is too low, you will have reduced power generation.
The Reactor and its Chambers are also highly reactive unless you have 100% or more Stabilization.
Upon taking damage, your Reactor components will take additional damage from internal explosions.

It's advised to have more than 100% Stabilization to avoid taking extra damage when in combat.

Element.Translation: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: This entity or one of the entities it is docked to, has old power blocks and will not allow the new reactor system to be placed down as long as any old power blocks remain.
Element.Original: This entity or one of the entities it is docked to, has old power blocks and will not allow the new reactor system to be placed down as long as any old power blocks remain.

Element.Translation: Erhöht den Erz/Bruchstück Ertrag für jeden abgebauten Ressourcenblock.
Element.Original: Increases the ore/shard resource yield for each resouce block mined.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: UNDO/REDO is currently on cooldown avoid bandwidth spam.
Element.Original: UNDO/REDO is currently on cooldown avoid bandwidth spam.

Element.Translation: This entity has new reactor blocks and will not allow the old power system to be placed down as long as any new reactor blocks remain.
Element.Original: This entity has new reactor blocks and will not allow the old power system to be placed down as long as any new reactor blocks remain.

Element.Translation: Invalid sector format. Type as \'x, y, z\'
Element.Original: Invalid sector format. Type as 'x, y, z'

Element.Translation: Current reactor doesn\'t support free warp gate target.
Element.Original: Current reactor doesn't support free warp gate target.

Element.Translation:
Warning: There is no conduit block next to this chamber block to connect it to your reactor tree.
A chamber needs to be next to a line of conduit blocks to connect it to either the main reactor or to another group of chambers.

You can also add chamber blocks to existing groups of the same general type (e.g. adding stealth chambers to a group of cloak chamber blocks).

Chamber systems are structured like a tree: the tree trunk is the main reactor, and the branches connect the chambers with conduits.
Chamber blocks themselves can be placed next to each other of the same type to increase their size.
Element.Original:
Warning: There is no conduit block next to this chamber block to connect it to your reactor tree.
A chamber needs to be next to a line of conduit blocks to connect it to either the main reactor or to another group of chambers.

You can also add chamber blocks to existing groups of the same general type (e.g. adding stealth chambers to a group of cloak chamber blocks).

Chamber systems are structured like a tree: the tree trunk is the main reactor, and the branches connect the chambers with conduits.
Chamber blocks themselves can be placed next to each other of the same type to increase their size.

Element.Translation:
A conduit connects chambers to a main reactor, or to another chamber in the tree.

Build lines of conduits to create a tree between your chambers and your main reactor.
Then open the radial menu to access your reactor under ship/station -> reactor or press %s when looking at the reactor.
Element.Original:
A conduit connects chambers to a main reactor, or to another chamber in the tree.

Build lines of conduits to create a tree between your chambers and your main reactor.
Then open the radial menu to access your reactor under ship/station -> reactor or press %s when looking at the reactor.

Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Original: No punishment: respawn protection still on!\n%s / %s seconds

Element.Original: No punishment: Sector set to peace!

Element.Original: Welcome to starmade, $PLAYER!, my name is "NPC-00"

Element.Original: Use energystream with more polygons on bigger sizes

Element.Original: Enter your StarMade Registry Username.\nIf you don't have one, please register at www.star-made.org\nas some servers only allow registered Users.

Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Original: Username or password wrong.\n\nIf you forgot your username or password, please visit registry.star-made.org!

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.

du kannst von deiner eigenen Fraktion Raketen und Mitglieder abschießen

Element.Original: Uses a part of your Thrust (set in the the Thrust Configuration menu) to apply a force in the orientation of this block.\n\rWorks only within proximity of another block and gravity well.

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.

Element.Translation: An wedged ingot of refined Zercaner.
Element.Original: An wedged ingot of refined Zercaner.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateL
Element.Translation: Factions können, abgesehen von Kriegserklärungen an eine andere Faction,\nauch einen einzelnen Spieler zum Feind erklären. Dies lässt sich\n im \'Faction\' Tab unter \'persönliche Feinde\' einstellen.
Element.Original: Factions can, instead of declaring war against a whole faction,\ndeclare war against a single player. This can be done in the\n'Faction' tab and clicking on the 'Personal Enemies' button.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateK
Element.Translation: Zukünftig wird es ein System geben das eine Art\nFraktionskrieg erlaubt um sich um Heimatbasen zu kümmern.
Element.Original: In the future there will be a system that allows\nsome kind of faction war to deal with homebases.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateM
Element.Translation: Faction Chat kann verwendet werden, \nindem man eine Chatnachricht mit \'/f\' beginnt \noder auch automatisch mit der Tastenkombination Shift+$CHAT.
Element.Original: Faction chat is also available by\nstarting a message with '/f ' in chat,\nor by pressing shift+$CHAT to do that automatically.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateH
Element.Translation:
Sie können auch aus mehreren Fraktions-Optionen wählen:
'Öffentliche Fraktion' erlaubt es Spielern
ohne Einladung beizutreten. 'Krieg erklären wenn feindselig'
wird automatisch den Krieg erklären
wenn Ihre Fraktion angegriffen wird. 'Neutral als feindlich'
ändert die Beziehung zu allen Fraktionslosen zu 'feindlich'
Element.Original:
You can also choose from several faction options:
'Public faction' makes it possible for players to
join without an invite. 'Declare war on hostile action'
will auto declare war when you faction is attacked.
'Consider neutral enemy' will change the relationship
with all faction-less entities to 'enemy'

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateG
Element.Translation: Du kannst einem Spieler einen Rang zuweisen, indem du auf \"Optionen\"\nneben seinem Namen klickst. In diesem Optionsmenü siehst du alle Ränge\nund du kannst Spieler direkt aus deiner Fraktion werfen.
Element.Original:
You can assign a rank to a player by clicking on 'options'
next to his name.
In that options menu you can see all ranks and
the ability to kick that person from your faction.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateJ
Element.Translation:
Das selbe gilt für eine Station, mit dem Unterschied
dass Sie eine Station auch zur Heimatbasis der
Fraktion machen können. Jede Fraktion kann nur
 EINE Heimatbasis haben da sie sehr große Vorteile bietet:
Heimatbasen und alle angedockten Schiffe sind unverwundbar.
Element.Original:
The same goes for a station, with the difference
that you can also make a station a faction's homebase.
Each faction can only have ONE homebase, as it has
a very big advantage: Homebases and everything docked
to it are invulnerable to damage.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateI
Element.Translation: Im faction hub können Sie Krieg erklären\n und Friedens-/Bündnisamgebote senden\nindem Sie auf \'Beziehung\' neben dem Fraktionsnamen klicken.
Element.Original: In the faction hub, you can declare war\nand send peace/alliance offers by clicking on\nthe 'relation' next to the faction's name.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateD
Element.Translation:
Im "Fraktion" Reiter kannst du deine Fraktion verwalten.
Du kannst eine Beschreibung hinzufügen und News Posts verfassen.
 News sind für alle Mitglieder deiner Fraktion sichtbar. Du kannst ausserdem Frieden schließen
oder Allianzen mit anderen Fraktionen gründen.
Element.Original:
In the "Faction" tab, you can manage your faction.
You can add a description and
write news posts. News will be visible for all
members of your faction. You can also accept peace
or alliance offers from other factions.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateC
Element.Translation:
Um eine Fraktion zu erstellen, klicke auf "Erstelle neue Fraktion"
im "Personal" Reiter. Wähle einen Namen
und klicke auf OK. Alternativ kannst du
im "Einladungen" Reiter eine Einladung akzeptieren.
Element.Original:
To create a faction, click on 'Create new faction'
in the 'Personal' tab. Choose a name
and click OK. You can alternatively,
also accept an invite by clicking on 'Invites'.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateF
Element.Translation:
Bearbeiten: Mitglieder können die Beschreibung ändern und News posten.
Rausschmeißen: Mitglieder können Mitglieder niedrigeren Ranges aus der Fraktion werfen.
Einladen: Mitglieder dürfen andere Spieler in die Fraktion einladen.
Berechtigungen bearbeiten: Gib dieses Recht nur dem Anführer der Fraktion,
da hiermit die Ränge bearbeitet werden können.
Element.Original:
Edit: Members are able to edit description
and post news.
Kick: Members can kick players of a lower rank.
Invite: Members are allowed to invite players to the faction.
Permission-Edit: Only give this to faction leaders, as it enables
them to modify the ranks.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateE
Element.Translation: Jedes Mitglied deiner Fraktion hat einen Rang.\nRänge können unter dem \"Rollen\" Reiter verwaltet werden.\nUm den Namen eines Ranges zu ändern, klicke auf ihn.
Element.Original:
Each member of your faction has a rank.
Ranks can be named and their permissions
can be set when clicking the "Roles" button.
To change the name of a rank, click on the name.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateA
Element.Translation: Fraktionen sind ein wesentlicher Bestandteil von StarMade.\nSpieler können einer Fraktion beitreten um zusammenzuarbeiten\num gemeinsame Ziele zu erreichen.
Element.Original: Factions are a vital part of StarMade.\nPlayers can gather under 1 faction and work together\nto accomplish a common goal.

Element.var: #TUTORIAL_This tutorial is about the Faction system;StateB
Element.Translation:
Drücke '$FACTION_MENU' um in das Fraktionsmenü zu gelangen.
Hier kannst du eine Fraktion erstellen und bearbeiten,
oder einer bereits existierenden Fraktion beitreten. Die Registerkarte "Fraktions Hub" gibt dir
eine Übersicht über alle existierenden Fraktionen im Spiel
und gibt dir die Möglichkeit, einer öffentlichen Fraktion beizutreten.
Element.Original:
Press '$FACTION_MENU' to open the faction panel.
From here you can create and edit your own, or join an existing
faction. The 'Faction hub' tab shows you an overview
of all current factions in the game
and allows you to join a public faction.

Element.Translation:
Shipyard Modules build the outer frame and define the usuable build-area of your shipyard.
After selecting your shipyard computer, place down an arc (U shape) of modules. Both end points have to be in line with each other.
Place down duplicate arcs to create a corridor. (The maximal distance from arc to arc is currently 32 blocks).
Element.Original:
Shipyard Modules build the outer frame and define the usuable build-area of your shipyard.
After selecting your shipyard computer, place down an arc (U shape) of modules. Both end points have to be in line with each other.
Place down duplicate arcs to create a corridor. (The maximal distance from arc to arc is currently 32 blocks).

Ein modischer Helm
to der vor den
gefahren des Weltalls schützt.

Um den Helm an oder aus zuziehen platztieren ihn in deine Aktionsleiste 
und aktiviere ihn mit der Linken Maus Taste (wen dein Inventar geschlossen ist)
Element.Original:
A fashionable helmet
to protect against the
dangers in space.

To put helmet on/off, place it in the action bar 
and activate it with LMB (with closed inventory)

Element.Original: the more the faster explosions at the same time are executed (costs in total about 20MB RAM each and of course CPU because it's all threaded) (10 is default for a medium powered singleplayer)

Element.Translation: wenn eingeschaltet wird das Massezentrum jeder Struktur anhand der Masse der Blöcke berechnet. Wenn ausgeschaltet ist das Zentrum immer die Position des Kerns
Element.Original: if on, the center of mass for each structured will be calculated based on block mass. On 'false', the center of mass is always the core position

Element.Translation: Kann nicht ohne Schwerkraft\nauf diesen Keil sitzen!
Element.Original: Can't sit on this wedge\nwithout gravity!

Element.Translation: Ship reboot cost per second at shop
Element.Original: Ship reboot cost per second at shop

Element.Translation: Du kannst nur oben drauf sitzen!
Schiffe und anderen Strukturen nutzen das Trefferpunktesystem. Wenn ausgeschaltet überhitzt das Schiff sobald der Kern außer Gefecht gesetzt wurde (alt)
Element.Original: ships and other structures use the hitpoint system. if off, a ship will overheat when the core gets taken out (old)

Element.Translation: Du kannst du oben drauf sitzen!

Funkelnde Bruchstücke aus Hattel, die so viel Licht reflektieren, dass es fast so aussieht als würden sie leuchten. Etliche Technologien basieren auf diesen Bruchstücken, sobald sie verarbeitet wurden.
Element.Original: Glittering Hattel Shards reflect so much light they almost seem to glow. Several technologies are based upon the use of these shards once processed.

Element.Translation: Uplink-Token, zur Verfügung gestellt, bei der Registrierung eines dedizierten Servers
Element.Original: uplink token, provided when registering a dedicated server

Element.Translation: Kann nur auf Blöcken und Keilen sitzen!
Element.Original: Can only sit on blocks and wedges!

Element.Translation: SPAWNPUNKT FEHLER GEFUNDEN \n BITTE SENDE EINEN BERICHT \n LÄNGE: %s
Element.Original: SPAWNING POINT ERROR DETECTED\nPLEASE SEND IN A REPORT\nLENGTH: %s

Element.Translation: Ein Scannersignal in\ndiesem Sektor hat deine\nTarn - und Störungssysteme unterbrochen!
Element.Original:
A scanner signal in
this sector has interrupted
your cloaking and jamming
systems!

Element.Translation:
In diesem Sektor
ist ein getarntes/verstecktes Objekt
aber unser Signal ist nicht stark
genug es zu finden!
Element.Original:
There is a cloaked/jamming
entity in this sector
but our signal isn't strong
enough to reveal it!

Element.Translation: Kann nicht scannen!\nAntrieb ist nicht geladen\n(%s/%s)

Element.Original: Do you really want to do this?

Element.Translation: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: wie schnell sollen Skins vom Server zum Client gesendet werden (zu hohe Werte können zu Lags führen) [Standard 256 ~ 16kb/s]
Element.Original: how fast should skins be transferred from server to clients (too high might cause lag) [default 256 ~ 16kb/s]

Element.Translation: A finely carved block of Cinnabar.
Element.Original: A finely carved block of Cinnabar.

Element.Translation: wie viele Stationen pro Sektor erlaubt sind
Element.Original: How many stations are allowed per sector

Element.Translation: wie viel eine Station oder einen Stationsblaupause kostet
Element.Original: how much does a station or station blueprint cost

Element.Translation: Beende Logik von Objekten die mehr als x Blöcke auf einmal aktivieren. Sie starten einen Logik-Cooldown von 10 Sekunden um die Server nicht zu überlasten
Element.Original: stop logic of objects that activate more than x blocks at once. They will enter a logic cooldown of 10 seconds to prevent servers from overloading

Element.Translation: Max logic activations at once per object stop
Element.Original: Max logic activations at once per object stop

Element.Translation: Erlaubte Anzahl an Koordinaten-Lesezeichen pro Spieler
By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Entlädt die aktuell geladenen Design. \nDies kann auch durch einen Rechtsklick auf das Design im Inventar gemacht werden.
Element.Original: Unloads the currently loaded design.\nThis can also be done by right-clicking on the design item.

Element.Translation: Willkommen zum Docking-Tutorial.\nEs erklärt, wie Du Docking-Gebiete baust\nund Schiffe oder Türme andockst
Element.Original:
Welcome to the Docking Tutorial.
This tutorial explains how to build
docking areas, and how to dock ships
and turrets

Element.Translation: Lädt ein existierendes Design.\nDies kann auch durch einen Rechtsklick auf das Design im Inventar gemacht werden.
Element.Original: Loads an existing design.\nThis can also be done by right-clicking on the design item.
Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: Max logic activations at once per object warning
Element.Original: Max logic activations at once per object warning

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: Warne bei Objekten die mehr als x Blöcke gleichzeitig aktivieren
Element.Original: warn about objects that activate more than x blocks at once

Element.Translation: Erstellt und lädt ein frisches Design.\nIm Design-Modus kannst du wie im Kreativ-Modus mit beliebigen Blöcken frei bauen, unabhängig von deinen Ressourcen.
Element.Original: Creates and loads a fresh design and places it here.\nIn design mode, you can build with any block type and amount.

Element.Translation: Max logic signal queue per object
Element.Original: Max logic signal queue per object

Element.Translation: minimaler Basispreises den ein Geschäft verlangt im Abhängigkeit zum Lagerbestand (z.B maximal 80 Credits wenn der Normalpreis 100 ist)
Element.Original: minimum of base price a shop will want depending on its stock (e.g. max 80 credits if the normal cost is 100)

Element.Translation: maximaler Basispreises den ein Geschäft verlangt im Abhängigkeit zum Lagerbestand (z.B maximal 120 Credits wenn der Normalpreis 100 ist)
Element.Original: maximum of base price a shop will want depending on its stock (e.g. max 120 credits if the normal cost is 100)

Element.Translation: Ein einst wertvolles und nützliches Erz, welches heute nur noch einen Wert für Sammler besitzt. Aber selbst dieser Wert sinkt, da Händler immer mehr ihrer Restbestände zum Verkauf anbieten.
Element.Original: A once useful ore, this rock is now only valued by collectors. Even that value wont last as many traders put their own stock up for sale.

Element.Translation: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)
Element.Original: Not the real thing (this item was temporarily used to test crafting)

Element.Translation: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Jump Drive Charged!\nRight click to jump!

Element.Translation: Kein Sprungantrieb-Modul mit diesem Computer verbunden
Element.Original: No Jump Drive Modules Connected to this computer

Element.Translation: An- und Verkaufspreise ändern sich in Abhängigkeit vom Lagerstand (Ladenpreise bleiben immer gleich wenn wahr)
Element.Original: shop buy and sell price change depending on stock (shop prices will always stay the same if true)

Element.Translation: Asteroid types are distributed based on heat.
Element.Original: Asteroid types are distributed based on heat.

Element.Translation: There are other galaxies to explore!
Element.Original: There are other galaxies to explore!

Element.Translation: Piracy can be a worthwhile source of income.
Element.Original: Piracy can be a worthwhile source of income.

Element.Translation: Mann, ich mag es wirklich nicht die Konsolen auf dieser Station zu benutzen! Die Hardware ist einfach nicht so gut\n wie das Zeug dass man sich selber baut, und günstiger ist es auch noch...
Element.Original: Man, I really don't like using the consoles on this station! The hardware just isn't as good as on the\nstuff you build yourself, and it's cheaper too...

Element.Translation: It\'s often worth trying to befriend the neighbors.
Element.Original: It's often worth trying to befriend the neighbors.

Element.Translation: You can visit every star in the sky.
Element.Original: You can visit every star in the sky.

Element.Translation: Sensors can compare two Display Modules\' contents. Useful for passwords, commands, etc.
Element.Original: Sensors can compare two Display Modules' contents. Useful for passwords, commands, etc.

Element.Translation: Warp Gates allow instantaneous travel across vast distances.
Element.Original: Warp Gates allow instantaneous travel across vast distances.

Element.Translation: Winning a race and want to stay that way?\nUse turrets with the Stop effect!
Element.Original: Winning a race and want to stay that way?\nUse turrets with the Stop effect!

Element.Translation: Using Hull blocks in place of Armor allows decoration without the extra weight.
Element.Original: Using Hull blocks in place of Armor allows decoration without the extra weight.

Element.Translation: Jump Inhibitors are useful for ambushes.
Element.Original: Jump Inhibitors are useful for ambushes.

Element.Translation: Is something moving too quickly?\nUse a Stop effect weapon to help your aim.
Element.Original: Is something moving too quickly?\nUse a Stop effect weapon to help your aim.

Element.Translation: Fortress shields got you down?\nAdd an Ion effect to your weapons for shield-busting.
Element.Original: Fortress shields got you down?\nAdd an Ion effect to your weapons for shield-busting.

Element.Translation: Each Ship Core functions as the cornerstone of your ship, it also provides a basic amount of thrust, power generation, power capacity, as well as some shield capacity. Remember, always carry spare cores to avoid becoming marooned. Press $SPAWN_SHIP with a Ship Core anywhere in your inventory to place the core in the space in front of you. Press $ACTIVATE to Enter/Exit.
Element.Original: Each Ship Core functions as the cornerstone of your ship, it also provides a basic amount of thrust, power generation, power capacity, as well as some shield capacity. Remember, always carry spare cores to avoid becoming marooned. Press $SPAWN_SHIP with a Ship Core anywhere in your inventory to place the core in the space in front of you. Press $ACTIVATE to Enter/Exit.

Element.Translation: A block of Varat Crystal. It\'s blue in colour and emits a soft glow.
Element.Original: A block of Varat Crystal. It's blue in colour and emits a soft glow.

Element.Translation: Wenn du noch kein Konto hast, gehe bitte auf www.star-made.org um eins zu erstellen
Element.Original: If you don't have an Account yet, please go to www.star-made.org to create one

Element.Translation: Bitte trage deine registry.star-made.org Anmeldeinformationen ein
Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: Processing Crystal Blocks along with Standard Armor produces Crystal Armor. With a complex crystaline composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Scavengers may not care about style, but other players might.
Element.Original: Scavengers may not care about style, but other players might.

Element.Translation: You are safe within the boundaries of Trading Guild shops\n...provided they like you.
Element.Original: You are safe within the boundaries of Trading Guild shops\n...provided they like you.

Element.Translation: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: Rotated Gravity Modules also influence their gravity direction.
Element.Original: Rotated Gravity Modules also influence their gravity direction.

Element.Translation: Larger ships are more powerful, but much harder to move.
Element.Original: Larger ships are more powerful, but much harder to move.

Element.Translation: Du musst nicht eingeloggt sein, um im Einzelspieler, oder im Mehrspieler zu spielen
Element.Original: You don't have to be logged on to play single, or multiplayer

Element.Translation: A little decoration goes a long way.
Element.Original: A little decoration goes a long way.

Element.Translation: You may use Gravity Modules to construct gravity lifts!
Element.Original: You may use Gravity Modules to construct gravity lifts!

Element.Translation: Rails allow you to move (and rotate) portions of your ship or its interior.
Element.Original: Rails allow you to move (and rotate) portions of your ship or its interior.

Element.Translation: Rail Rotators are useful for decoration, too!
Element.Original: Rail Rotators are useful for decoration, too!

Element.Translation: An wedged ingot of refined Threns.
Element.Original: An wedged ingot of refined Threns.

Element.Translation: du kannst von deiner eigenen Fraktion Raketen und Mitglieder abschießen
Element.Original: can shoot down own or missiles from own faction

Element.Translation: Standardoption für Baupläne die noch nicht im Katalog sind
Element.Original: Default option for blueprints not in catalog yet

Element.Translation: benutzte Rezept-Grundpreise (der Grundpreis ist der Preis aller Teile die zur Herstellung benötigt werden)
Element.Original: use recipe based prices (the price is the price of the parts it is made out of in crafting)

Element.Translation: Geben sie einen gültigen Dateinamen an
Element.Original: Name must be a legal file name

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: fracht wird jede minute ausgeworfen, wenn speicher über der kapazität steht
Element.Original: cargo is ejected every minute if storage is at over capacity
Unit Group Invalid! Must be a flat 'C'-shape.

Element.Translation: Wählen Sie die zu importierende Datenbank

eine Chance von \"eins zu thisValue\" für einen Spezialregions-Spawn pro Planetseite (zB. Städte, Pyramiden, usw) (Änderungen könnten Planetenseiten beeinflussen, jedoch keine die bereits vom Spieler verändert wurden)
Element.Original: one out of thisValue chance of a special region spawning per planet plate (cities, pyramids, etc) (changing this value migth change some plates, but won't change any plates that are already modified by a player)

Element.Translation: Heimbasen einer Fraktion sind erst dann angreifbar wenn die Fraktionspunkte der jeweiligen Fraktion im Minus sind und die Fraktion kein Territorium mehr besitzt
Element.Original: Home bases become attackable if a faction's Faction Points are in the minus and the faction doesn't own any territory

Element.Translation: Make homebase destructable on FP deficit
Element.Original: Make homebase destructable on FP deficit

Element.Translation: modifikator um den dynamischen Preis anzupassen
Chunk request thread pool size CPU
Element.Original: Chunk request thread pool size CPU

Element.Translation: Verfügbare Prozesse für CPU generation. ACHTUNG: Zu viele können die CPU überlasten. Am besten ist: Anzahl der Kerne - 1
Element.Original: Available threads of total for CPU generation. WARNING: too high can cause cpu spikes. About the amount of available cores minus one is best

Element.Translation:
#### Beginn der Übertragung
Basis %s:
 Feindliche Aktivitäten in %s...
Sende Überfallkommando
#### Ende der Übertragung
Element.Original:

Base %s:
Hostile signs in %s...
Sending raiding party...

Element.Original: Chunk request thread pool size total

Element.Translation: Bitte einen Namen für das neue Universum eingeben.
Element.Original: Please enter a name for your Universe.

Element.Translation:
#### Übertragung gestartet
Ziel ist geflohen...
Kehre zurück zur Basis
#### Übertragung Ende
Element.Original:
#### Transmission Start
Target has fled...
Return to base...

Element.Translation: Die Thread-Poolgröße für Chunk-Anfragen (von der Festplatte und generiert)
Element.Original: Thead pool size for chunk requests (from disk and generated)

Element.Translation: Anzahl der gesendeten Blöcke pro Update. Große Plazierungen laufen schneller, brauchen aber auch eine bessere Internetverbindung und sind der Grund für Spam
Element.Original: How many blocks are sent per update. Huge placements will shot faster, but it will consume more bandwidth and is subject to spamming players

Element.Translation: Möchten Sie dieses Universum wirklich löschen
Element.Original: Do you really want to delete this universe

Element.Translation: How many cloaked ships have you found?
Element.Original: How many cloaked ships have you found?

Element.Translation: Each faction can have one homebase.\nEverything docked thereto is invulnerable.
Element.Original: Each faction can have one homebase.\nEverything docked thereto is invulnerable.

Element.Translation: Jammers interfere with hostile AI\'s targeting abilities.
Element.Original: Jammers interfere with hostile AI's targeting abilities.

Element.Translation: Be careful when settling near Pirate stations.\nThey will continually hunt you down.
Element.Original: Be careful when settling near Pirate stations.\nThey will continually hunt you down.

Element.Translation: Sie dürfen nicht in einer Struktur sein um dieses Tutorial zu starten.
Element.Original: You can't be in a structure\nto do this tutorial.

Element.Translation: The larger a missile\'s warhead, the higher its hitpoints.
Element.Original: The larger a missile's warhead, the higher its hitpoints.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Must only contain letters or numbers or (_-)!

Element.Translation: Bitte gib einen Namen für dein Schiff ein!
Element.Original: Please type in a name for your new Ship!

Element.Translation: Multiple buttons may toggle a single Flip-Flop (e.g. for light switches)
Element.Original: Multiple buttons may toggle a single Flip-Flop (e.g. for light switches)

Element.Translation: Delays can be chained to achieve longer delays.
Element.Original: Delays can be chained to achieve longer delays.

Element.Translation: Sensors used on thrusters can detect your speed, useful for engine decoration.
Element.Original: Sensors used on thrusters can detect your speed, useful for engine decoration.

Element.Translation: Decreases the power usage of your Scanner.
Element.Original: Decreases the power usage of your Scanner.

Element.Translation: As of June 1st, 2017, the StarMade Launcher consists of 10,688 lines of code.
Element.Original: As of June 1st, 2017, the StarMade Launcher consists of 10,688 lines of code.

Element.Translation: A cross-connected Delay and Not-Signal form a basic 0.5 second clock.
Element.Original: A cross-connected Delay and Not-Signal form a basic 0.5 second clock.

Element.Translation: A strange, alien type of vine.
Element.Original: A strange, alien type of vine.

Element.Translation: You can use Rail Speed Controllers to set rotation speeds.
Element.Original: You can use Rail Speed Controllers to set rotation speeds.

Element.Translation: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Obwohl sie keine wirkliche Panzerung und nur wenig Strukturpunkte besitzt, ist sie sehr gut einsetzbar um eine solide Grundstruktur und Hülle zu erschaffen. Zudem kann sie schnell und einfach mit nur wenigen Materialien in der Fabrik hergestellt werden.
Element.Original: Although unarmored and with average health, factories can quickly and easily create Basic Armor by processing a small amount of basic materials.

Element.Translation: You can copy one Display Module to another using buttons/activators
Element.Original: You can copy one Display Module to another using buttons/activators

Element.Translation: Sensors can detect the state of doors, useful for hangar/airlock indicators.
Element.Original: Sensors can detect the state of doors, useful for hangar/airlock indicators.

Element.Translation: Buttons/Activators copy adjacent rail types and orientations to the rails they are linked to.
Element.Original: Buttons/Activators copy adjacent rail types and orientations to the rails they are linked to.

Element.Translation: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.
Element.Original: By further processing Basic Armor blocks, Standard Armor has more health as well as damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: Kann nicht kaufen!\nKein Shop in der Nähe!
Element.Original: ERROR:\nCannot buy!\nYou are not near a shop!

Element.Translation: Diese Blaupause kaufen?\nEin Blaupausen objekt wird in ihrem Inventar abgelegt.\nMit Rechtsklick auf dieses Objekt können sie Resourcen hinzufügen/spawnen.
Element.Original:
Do you want to buy this blueprint?
This will put the blueprint in your
inventory. Right click on it to provide
the necessary materials.

Element.Translation: If you find a bug, report it on phab.starma.de!
Element.Original: If you find a bug, report it on phab.starma.de!

Element.Translation: As always, thank you for playing StarMade!\n ~ The Schine Team
Element.Original: As always, thank you for playing StarMade!\n ~ The Schine Team

Element.Translation: Holding [%s] displays the quick radial menu.
Element.Original: Holding [%s] displays the quick radial menu.

Element.Translation: Debug (nicht aktivieren, wenn du nicht weißt, was du da tust)
Element.Original: debug (don't activate unless you know what you're doing)

Element.Translation: The Docking Module allows the user to create a fixed Docking Zone. This Zone can then be Docked/Undocked with, by using the Ship Core\'s built-in Docking Beam. Docking Modules can be oriented, and must not have any obstructions in their Zone (The Green Box), other than the docked item in question. Otherwise, the Module will go offline, and no docking will be allowed until the obstruction is removed.
Element.Original: The Docking Module allows the user to create a fixed Docking Zone. This Zone can then be Docked/Undocked with, by using the Ship Core's built-in Docking Beam. Docking Modules can be oriented, and must not have any obstructions in their Zone (The Green Box), other than the docked item in question. Otherwise, the Module will go offline, and no docking will be allowed until the obstruction is removed.

Element.Translation: You may customize your controls from the options menu.
Element.Original: You may customize your controls from the options menu.

Element.Translation: Combine weapons to get different effects.
Element.Original: Combine weapons to get different effects.

Element.Translation: All weapons are balanced; use whichever fits your needs!
Element.Original: All weapons are balanced; use whichever fits your needs!

Element.Translation: Lock-on missiles (beam+missile) only rarely miss their targets.
Element.Original: Lock-on missiles (beam+missile) only rarely miss their targets.

Element.Translation: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to place multiple blocks at once.
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to place multiple blocks at once.

Element.Translation: In Advanced Build Mode ([%s]), the arrow points to the front of the ship.
Element.Original: In Advanced Build Mode ([%s]), the arrow points to the front of the ship.

Element.Translation: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to copy/paste.
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) allows you to copy/paste.

Element.Translation: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) symmetry planes reduce your work by up to 8x!
Element.Original: Advanced Build Mode ([%s]) symmetry planes reduce your work by up to 8x!

Element.Translation: Pressing [%s] while in Build Mode gives you access to Advanced Build Mode.
Element.Original: Pressing [%s] while in Build Mode gives you access to Advanced Build Mode.

Element.Translation: Circuitry in StarMade is Turing-complete: you can make anything!
Element.Original: Circuitry in StarMade is Turing-complete: you can make anything!

Element.Translation: Activators and buttons adjacent to basic rails detect objects moving on that rail.
Element.Original: Activators and buttons adjacent to basic rails detect objects moving on that rail.

Element.Translation: You may specify names for Inner Ship Remotes, which will display on the hotbar.
Element.Original: You may specify names for Inner Ship Remotes, which will display on the hotbar.

Element.Translation: Heavy armor will protect you, but hinders mobility. Choose carefully.
Element.Original: Heavy armor will protect you, but hinders mobility. Choose carefully.

Element.Translation: Missiles may be destroyed with a well-placed shot.
Element.Original: Missiles may be destroyed with a well-placed shot.

Element.Translation: Point-defense turrets automatically fire at hostile missiles or astronauts.
Element.Original: Point-defense turrets automatically fire at hostile missiles or astronauts.

Element.Translation: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.
Element.Original: Makes factories more efficient by increasing the number of production lines active during each factory cycle.

Element.Translation: Beams are quite effective up close, but useless at a distance.
Element.Original: Beams are quite effective up close, but useless at a distance.

Element.Translation: Warheads may detonate if damaged. Use caution!
Element.Original: Warheads may detonate if damaged. Use caution!

Element.Translation: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.
Element.Original: Light blocks are an excellent way to add illumination to the area.

Element.Translation: aktiviert oder deaktiviert die Fähigkeit Blaupausen aus einem Item zu spawnen
Element.Original: enables or disables blueprint spawning from item

Element.Translation: Kann kein multi-slot löschen.\n(Rechtsklicken und splitten).
Element.Original: Cannot sell a whole stack at once (yet)\nRight click and split it first.

Element.Translation: Further processing of Standard Armor results in Advanced Armor. With a far denser composition, it grants increased health and greater damage reducing properties.

Element.Translation: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.
Element.Original: These modules can be used to create doorways that can be opened or closed by the player, docking beams, and logic systems. Multiple adjacent blocks register as one door. Meaning that activating one will activate all other doors touching it. Quite useful for creating large doorways. Blast Doors are significantly more durable than standard Plex or Glass Doors. Press $ACTIVATE to Open/Close.

Element.Translation: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it\'s Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.
Element.Original: Activation Gates are capable of detecting an entity passing through it's Gate structure, sending a True signal to any Logic block linked to the Controller.. The gate must be a solid, 1 block deep ring structure linked to a Activation Gate controller. To link your Activation Gate Controller to the Activation Gate Module structure, press C on the Controller, then V on the individual modules, or alternatively Shift + V to mass select grouped modules.

Element.Translation: Toleranz für den Auslöser für geänderte Blaupausen (Standard = 10%)

The Pickup Point block will project a 3x3 detection sphere. When a ship\'s docking module enters that detection area, the entity will be guided to a Pickup Rail if applicable.\n\rShips will remember the last used Pickup Area modules they dock to and if they\'re part of a fleet, they\'ll return to them when the \"Carrier Recall\" order is issued. The flagship is where they\'ll try to return, multiple carriers per fleet is not allowed yet.
Element.Original: The Pickup Point block will project a 3x3 detection sphere. When a ship's docking module enters that detection area, the entity will be guided to a Pickup Rail if applicable.\n\rShips will remember the last used Pickup Area modules they dock to and if they're part of a fleet, they'll return to them when the "Carrier Recall" order is issued. The flagship is where they'll try to return, multiple carriers per fleet is not allowed yet.

Drücke $ACTIVATE zum Benutzen.
Element.Original: The Plex Lift can be used to create elevators and lifts within large stations or ships where needed. They are especially useful when combined with the Gravity Unit. Similar to Plex Doors, having them adjacent on one another allows for larger/longer lifts. Press $ACTIVATE to Activate/Deactivate.

Element.Translation: The Damage Beam Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Beam systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Beam Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs. Element.Original: The Damage Beam Computer is required for creating functioning Damage Beam systems. It is capable of controlling any amount of Damage Beam Modules, although using multiple groups leads to escalating power costs.
